variable.name: F81VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F81DAYS
variable.comment: Days between randomization and the date the form was initiated

variable.name: PELVICDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to pelvic exam

variable.name: PLVABNRM
variable.comment:
Were there any abnormal findings found during the pelvic exam? Sub-question of F81 V6 Q6 'Pelvic exam performed by'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 81.

variable.name: ADIPOSE
variable.comment:
External genitalia (vulva): loss of adipose tissue Not collected on all versions of Form 81.
Not required if 'Pelvic exam performed by' is 'Other'.
